Headline: #81 Lawrence Temporary Westbound Reroute near Lawrence/Lipps
ShortDescription: Westbound 81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Lipps.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Lipps.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Western. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Western.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
